price: 66. Wuxuu (Yacquub) yidhi: Idinla diri maayo jeer aad i siisaan ballan adag oo aad ku dhaarataan Magaca Alle, inaad dib iigu keeneysaan, in (col) idin hareereeyo maahee, markay siiyeen ballankooda, wuxuu yidhi: Alle baa marag ka ah waxaanu leennahay.
arabic: قَالَ لَنۡ أُرۡسِلَهُۥ مَعَكُمۡ حَتَّىٰ تُؤۡتُونِ مَوۡثِقٗا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ لَتَأۡتُنَّنِي بِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ أَن يُحَاطَ بِكُمۡۖ فَلَمَّآ ءَاتَوۡهُ مَوۡثِقَهُمۡ قَالَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ مَا نَقُولُ وَكِيلٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla lan ur'silahu maʿakum ḥattā tu'tūni mawthiqan mina al-lahi latatunnanī bihi illā an yuḥāṭa bikum falammā ātawhu mawthiqahum qāla al-lahu ʿalā mā naqūlu wakīlun
translations: that surely you will bring him to me
that surely you will bring him to me
